column2: Minimum Frame Size (bits) = 2 × Propagation Time × Bandwidth
S = G × e^(-2G), Maximum at G=0.5, Smax = 0.184 (18.4%)
S = G × e^(-G), Maximum at G=1, Smax = 0.368 (36.8%)
2^r ≥ m + r + 1, where m=data bits, r=parity bits
Number of subnets = 2^n, where n = borrowed bits
Hosts per subnet = 2^h - 2, where h = host bits
